OOC: No fair I had a plan to destroy the Iron Fist at least, but I 
still needed better shielding for the Geotrons adn a way for them to 
get OFF Alliance Island after they got on.  IT'S NOT FAIR!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "legendarynemasis" <Legendarynemasis@a...> wrote:
> OOC: Whee, a long overdue post. This was approved by the council, so 
> whee. Now then without further adu, the end of the Alliance island 
> debate.
> 
> The Bamphomet looked to Blacknightmare for a moment as she addressed 
> him as "master." Immediately his visor began to glow red as the 
small 
> Infecticon god seemingly became agitated.
> 
> Bamphomet: "You now adress me as master when ebfore you would not. 
> Your programming is setting in. But now you insult me by looking at 
> me. No unworthy mortal has the right to look upon their god! Now 
look 
> away or I shall burn your optics out from where I stand and render 
> you blind. As for you Chaostaur, I shall give you a demonstration of 
> my creations powers and how your resistance is completely, and 
> utterly futile."
> 
> As the Bamphomet says this a viewscreen appears in the room which 
> shows a birds eye view of the alliance's island base. Or whats left 
> of it. The bamphomet then begins to glow a pale blue as back in at 
> the Fury cannon main base, lucenite also glows a pale blue and then 
> presses a red button. In the sky a massive pillar of energy once 
> again rises from the see, evaporating whatever water and destroying 
> anything that is in its path. At the same sime three seperate 
smaller 
> cannon sites at their respective locations all fire at the same 
time. 
> The three smaller cannon beams are the first to penetrate the earths 
> atmosphere and enter space where they strike one of the dishes of 
the 
> Infecticon satelite and soon dissapear. The dish then enlarges a 
> great deal as the massive pillar of energy from the fury cannon 
> collides with it and is quickly absorbed. 
> 
> After a few tense moments of silence, the satelite then transforms 
> yet again into a massive dish that sends out a gigantic beam fo 
> eneergy barrelling down back at the Earth. On the view screen, the 
> pillar of energy quickly encompasses the view and then from all over 
> the world a bright flash can be seen before a gigantic explosion 
> takes place, one so large, it can even be seen from space, and more 
> importantly the sacriligious plague. All voer the planet, the 
> scanners of various bases would pick up the massive blast. 
> 
> After the light dims, and the dust and smoke parts, all that is left 
> of the island is a gigantic crater now burrowed into the oceans 
floor 
> as the water seems to part away from it. A second later the water 
> then crashes into the now open space. The view screen now focuss on 
> what was at one time the location of the alliances island, which is 
> now nothing but endless waves. The screen then dims and the 
Bamphomet 
> chuckles.
> 
> Bamphomet: "You see how easy we can exterminate life here? THere is 
> no point to your resisting us. We are the only faction that will 
> remain. You will either join us or die. If you join us we can 
enhance 
> your body to make you stronger. The choice is yours. But just so you 
> know, the purge has begun. The next target that will be obliteratd 
by 
> my forces shall be what the cybertronians here call "Maximal City."
